newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazilian candidate pledges to bare all for votes.
newsitem.headline: Brazilian candidate pledges to bare all for votes.

text.p: A Brazilian city council candidate has pledged to parade through town naked, covered only in paint, if voters elect her next month.

Journalism student Allesandra Goncalves, 22, who is campaigning in Varzea Grande, the second largest city in Mato Grosso state, told the Correio Braziliense newspaper: "It's not pornographic. This is political marketing."
It quoted her on Wednesday as saying she was making the pledge partly for lack of funds. "Running a political campaign without money is difficult. Taking your clothes off isn't."
